我想試下

I've been to many countries on vacation. I had always thought that many other countries were better than Hong Kong but after I went to these countries on vacation, I realized that in terms of city life, nightlife, food and shopping, Hong Kong really is the best. In Europe, shops close at four on weekdays and don't open at all on weekends except big cities like London where shoos close at six on weekdays and four on the weekends. Their main sorts of entertainment are pubs and clubs. Las Vegas has spectacular night views but it was primarily built for tourism. It's famous for gambling, unique hotel design and shows like boxing events. However, in terms of scenery, Scandinavia and Tibet are the most ravishing I would say. Tibet is famous for its breathtaking scenery at high altitude. Xinjiang is also a place of outstanding scenic beauty. If you think you might have altitude sickness, such as dizziness, headache or trouble sleeping, I suggest that you bring some medicine along. In fact, my friend who's been to the Mount Everest base camp showed me his photos taken there by which I was awestruck. It's definitely a glamorous holiday destination. A tour of the Mount Everest base camp would be a once in a lifetime experience. Tibet is also the best place for stargazing as it's much closer to the heavens than any other places on earth and the sky at night is often clear and cloudless. It has some of the highest lakes in the world that are rich with fish and other marine life and the surrounding countryside is inhabited by flocks of yellow ducks and wild horses as well as donkeys. The lakes there, such as Lake Paiku which is four thousand five hundred and ninety two meters above sea level, reflect the beauty of the stars, giving a double view of the sky at night. You can even set up camp there to get the best view of the stars and the Milky Way galaxy.

replies.msg:
宜家身邊係日本拎working visa既人
大多數都係拎「技術・人文知識・国際業務」
Engineer最多亦最易
其次就係國際業務相關
只要份工講到需要翻譯/識多語言既你

呢個時候如果你有大卒(top up都得)+N1/N2(bonus)
基本上必轉到

如果係high dip
就要有個行既相關工作經驗

例如酒店counter接待
就算你好做到野
公司願意幫你申請visa
但會因為你冇大卒
high dip/工作經驗同旅遊業冇關
而reject你既apply
